sense.def:
To opt for something
pomeni izbrati nekaj.
To opt to do something
pomeni, da se odločimo, da bomo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: My father left the choice of career to me, and I opted for law.
...those who opt to cooperate with the regime.

sense.def:
To opt out of something
pomeni odločiti se, da pri nečem ne bomo sodelovali.

seg.quote: He tried to opt out of political decision-making.
